24687.name: Superior Rune of the Afflicted
24687.description:
Element: Brilliance
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +10% Condition Duration; create a death nova at a foe's location upon their defeat. (Cooldown: 15 Seconds)

24688.name: Superior Rune of the Lich
24688.description:
Element: Brilliance
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +4% Condition Damage; summon a jagged horror while in combat. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 60 Seconds)</c>

24691.name: Superior Rune of the Traveler
24691.description:
Element: Skill
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

24696.name: Superior Rune of the Flock
24696.description:
Element: Brilliance
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +10% Increased Maximum Health; you and nearby allies are healed for an additional amount after you use a healing skill. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 10 Seconds)</c>

24699.name: Superior Rune of the Dolyak
24699.description:
Element: Potence
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

24702.name: Superior Rune of the Pack
24702.description:
Element: Skill
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +125 Precision; grant nearby allies 5 stacks of might, fury, and swiftness for 8 seconds while in combat. (Cooldown: 30 Seconds)

24703.name: Superior Rune of Infiltration
24703.description:
Element: Skill
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: Deal +10% increased strike damage to enemies below 50% health; gain 5 seconds of vigor after entering stealth. (Cooldown: 30 Seconds)

24708.name: Superior Rune of Mercy
24708.description:
Element: Brilliance
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: -20% incoming damage while reviving an ally.
Revive allies 20% faster and with 30% more health.

24711.name: Superior Rune of Vampirism
24711.description:
Element: Potence
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +10% Maximum Health; restore 10% of your health upon killing a foe.

24714.name: Superior Rune of Strength
24714.description:
Element: Potence
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +20% Might duration; increase strike damage by 5% while under the effect of might.

24717.name: Superior Rune of Rage
24717.description:
Element: Skill
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: Gain fury for 8 seconds when entering combat. (Cooldown: 10 Seconds)
+20% Fury duration; increase strike damage dealt by 5% while under the effect of fury.

24720.name: Superior Rune of Speed
24720.description:
Element: Brilliance
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +20% Swiftness Duration; increase movement speed by 66% when under the effect of swiftness.

24723.name: Superior Rune of the Eagle
24723.description:
Element: Brilliance
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +125 Ferocity; deal 10% increased strike damage to targets with less than 50% health.

24726.name: Superior Rune of Rata Sum
24726.description:
Element: Brilliance
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +10% Condition Duration; summon a gamma-ray field that grants might upon entering combat. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 60 Seconds)</c>

24729.name: Superior Rune of Hoelbrak

Element: Potence
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

24732.name: Superior Rune of Divinity

Element: Brilliance
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +20% Protection Duration; when struck by a foe, a meadow blooms at your location, granting vigor, regeneration, and protection to allies within it. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 90 Seconds)</c>

24738.description:
Element: Skill

bonuses: +20% Poison Duration; convert 7% of your vitality into condition damage.

bonuses: +10% Incoming Heal Effectiveness; gain protection and magnetic aura when struck by a foe. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 60 Seconds)</c>

bonuses: Gain fire aura for 4 seconds when entering combat.

24768.name: Superior Rune of Dwayna

bonuses: +10% Maximum Health; regeneration you apply is 20% more effective.

bonuses: -10% Incoming Condition Duration; -20% Incoming Stun Duration

bonuses: 7% of vitality is converted to ferocity.

Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: -66% Incoming Chill Duration; gain frost aura for 4 seconds when hit by a foe while under 50% health. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 90 Seconds)</c>

bonuses: +20% Burning Duration; increase damage to burning foes by 7%.

bonuses: +7% damage while you have an active companion.

bonuses: +10% Healing effectiveness to other allies; increase healing effectiveness to other allies by an additional 1% for 3 seconds after granting a boon to any ally (up to a maximum of 10 stacks).

bonuses: +20% Might Duration; gain 5 stacks of might for 4 seconds after inflicting weakness on a foe. (Cooldown: 1 Second)

bonuses: +10% Condition Duration; deliver an attack that transfers a condition and blinds nearby enemies after using an elite skill. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 45 Seconds)</c>

bonuses: +20% Bleeding Duration; summon ravens to attack nearby enemies after using an elite skill. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 45 Seconds)</c>

bonuses: +125 Healing Power; transfer 1 condition from 5 allies within a 600 radius to yourself after using an elite skill. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 10 seconds)</c>

44951.description:
Element: Brilliance
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: 3% of vitality is converted to healing power.
5% of vitality is converted to precision.
7% of vitality is converted to power.

Element: Potence
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +20% Torment Duration; gain regeneration after inflicting a foe with torment.

bonuses: +20% Confusion duration; decrease strike damage dealt to you by confused foes by 10%.

Element: Potence

bonuses: -10% Incoming Condition Duration; inflict nearby foes with 1 second of fear and 5 seconds of poison after using an elite skill. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 45 Seconds)</c>

48907.description:
Element: Skill
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: -10% Incoming condition duration. Incoming condition cleanses remove an additional condition

bonuses: -10% Incoming Condition Duration; gain resistance for 4 seconds after activating an elite skill. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 20 Seconds)</c>

bonuses: Gain 3 seconds of stealth and superspeed after using a trap skill.

bonuses: +10% Boon Duration; increase the duration of auras you grant by +33%.

67344.name: Superior Rune of Evasion

bonuses: +125 ferocity; gain swiftness for 6 seconds after evading an attack. <c=@reminder> Cooldown: 1 second.</c>

67912.name: Superior Rune of the Defender
67912.description:
Element: Potence
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +10% Maximum Health; heal for 5% of your maximum health after blocking an attack. (Cooldown: 1 Second)

68437.name: Superior Rune of Snowfall
68437.description:
Element: Brilliance
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: Gain 15 seconds of regeneration when you take falling damage. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 20 Seconds)</c>
Gain 3 seconds of superspeed when you take falling damage. 5% of your toughness is converted into healing power. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 10s)</c>
Create a pile of snow that chills enemies when you take falling damage. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 20 Seconds)</c>

69370.description:

bonuses: +18 to All Stats; gain 2 seconds of resistance after using a healing skill. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 10 Seconds)</c>

bonuses: Gain +500 healing power for 3 seconds after casting a glyph.

When using a heal skill, apply protection to nearby allies (360 radius).

Create a pile of snow that chills enemies when you take falling damage. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 20 Seconds)</c>
